data.eml:eml: Revision of the Afrotropical genus Fernandea Melichar, 1912 (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Dictyopharidae), with description of a new species from Equatorial Guinea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Zhi-Shun, Malenovský, Igor, Liang, Ai-Ping (2016): Revision of the Afrotropical genus Fernandea Melichar, 1912 (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Dictyopharidae), with description of a new species from Equatorial Guinea. Zootaxa 4139 (1): 106-116, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4139.1.6
